thread.section_title: Precision Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Precision Tax Relief | www.precisiontaxrelief.com
thread.title: Debra Hazelton
thread.title_full: Precision Tax Relief reviewed by Debra Hazelton

author: Debra Hazelton
title: Debra Hazelton
text: Dealing with the IRS is not something for the inexperienced. I would not wish it on anyone. I am so glad that Precision was there to help me through it. It was still difficult to walk through, but less difficult if I had tried to go through it myself. Thank you again!! This is a BIG weight off my shoulders.
